paharagena gos pahara dun manthriwarayata wada waradi ada (3) udasana mathale polisiyata pamina bhara wu shrilanipaye hitapu parlimenthu manthri lakshman wasantha perera mahatha athadanguwata mathiwarana raswim sandaha mahamargaya awahira karanne balagenayi mathiwarana pracharaka raswim sandaha mahamargaya awahira wanase wedika idikirima sambandhayen mathiwarana departhamenthuwe awadhanaya jawipe chanda balaye wayasa adu karayi janatha wimukthi peramune jathika wadapiliwela yatathe merata tharuna tharuniyanta wadi awasthawak ha samaja wagakimak labadime aramuna athiwa postar rakaganna apekshakayan ma.ko. hamuwata mathiwarana postar, katawut, banar iwath kirima sima karana lesata mathiwarana komasaris mahinda deshapriya mahathagen illa sitimata pirith pothen chanda bilibama chanda wyaparaya atharathure manapa laba ganimata apekshakayan wiwidha upakrama bhawitha karana athara ewani aluthma kramayak athhada balanna amathi si.bi. ge gedara ginnak amathi si.bi. rathnayakata ayath bawa salakena themahal niwasak ginnakin winasha wi athi bawa wartha we.

mathiwaranaye prathipala nikuthwu wahama anshaka 180 ka karanamak gasamin, hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapakshage shri lanka podujana peramuna (shrilanpope) samaga ekwa nuwara eliya disthrikkaye palathpalana aayathana 11 palana balaya thahawuru karaganna bawa niwedanaya kala sidabliwsi nayaka arumugam thondaman, parlimenthu manthriwarayeku ha shrilanpope nayakayeku wana si.bi. rathnayaka samaga ekwa widi pelapaliwalata sahabhagi wemin mathiwarana jayagrahanaye sathuta samariya.

mema prakasha siyallehi arthaya, aanduwa kerehi palakerena kumana aakarayaka ho wiruddhathwayak matha “thrasthawadi” hanwaduwa gasana bawath, “widesha balawega” wisin usiganwanu labana bawath, eewa militari balaya yoda thala damana bawathya. 2009di militari le snanayakin awasanwu 30 wasaraka wargawadi yuddhaye awasan adiyarayanhidi rajapaksha aanduwa, watup ha jiwana thathwayan wadidiyunukara ganima sandaha pana nangi sama aragalayakma bedumwadi demala eelam wimukthi koti sanwidhanayata udaw kirimak lesa hanwadu gasiya.

dhiwara saha jalaja sampath amathya mahinda amarawira, widuli sandesha saha dijital yatithala pahasukam amathya harin pranandu, jathika sahajiwana, sanwada saha rajya bhasha amathya mano ganeshan, parlimenthu manthri ranjith aluwihare, agramathya lekam saman eekanayaka, sanwardhana upaya marga ha jathyanthara welenda amathyansha lekam chandani wijayawardhana, agramathya athireka lekam saman athawudahetti, wishesha sahayika sandra perera yana mahathma mahathmihuda me sancharayata ekwa sitithi.
